name: Pandoras
description:
PANDORAS

Help the archeologist to take the treasure from the legendary ruins Pandoras

But be careful, there are rumors that the treasure are cursed and a lot of spirits guarding the treasure.

How to Play

Use the holy light to repel the spirit 

AWSD to Walk

Mouse to Aim the Holy Light

If the archeologist die, he will return to the camp and begin collecting the treasure again

(There are still many stuff to do, but I cant made it in time hahaha sad)

You can download the desktop version if you want
